properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 10 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
A few southwesterly wind gusts of around 20 knots are possible
this afternoon over the lower tidal Potomac River from Cobb Island
to Smith Point, Virginia, as well as the Chesapeake Bay waters
south of Drum Point, Maryland. Mariners, especially those in
smaller vessels, should exercise extra caution if navigating the
waters during this time.

NWSheadline: OCCASIONAL WIND GUSTS TO AROUND 20 KNOTS
